org.ecoinformatics.seek.querybuilder

Class DBQueryDefParserEmitter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ecoinformatics.seek.querybuilder.DBQueryDefParserEmitter

  • public class DBQueryDefParserEmitter
extends java.lang.Object
    This is class is used to parse XML and create a DBQueryDef object and/or emit XML from a DBQuery object
    Call "readQueryDef" for reading in a query
    Call "emitXML" to generate the XML
